taxon_name.authority: Rydberg in N. L. Britton et al.

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family asteraceae;tribe heliantheae;subtribe peritylinae;genus perityle;section laphamia;species gilensis;variety gilensis

bio:treatment.description: Plants upright to spreading, 22–40 cm. Leaves: petioles 9–25(–30) mm; lobes of mid and distal leaves elliptic to ovate, to 1 × 1 cm. 2n = 68–72.
Crevices igneous bluffs and boulders especially canyon walls;
bio:treatment.discussion: Proximal leaves of vars. gilensis and salensis may appear similar; lobes of the mid and distal leaves are elliptic to ovate in var. gilensis and linear to long-spatulate in var. salensis.
